languages.text: {n}Джай небрежно отмахивается и тут же складывается пополам, заходясь надрывным кашлем. Вязкие сгустки крови остаются на ее металлической ладони.{/n} "Гроксово семя! Это... кха-а... долгая и грязная история. А я не хочу портить момент".

{n}Jae nonchalantly waves her off and immediately doubles over, coughing violently, leaving viscous clots of blood on her metal hand.{/n} "Groxseed! It's... it's—" {n}She is interrupted by her hacking cough.{/n} "—a long and grubby story, and I don't want to ruin the moment."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай небрежно отмахивается и тут же складывается пополам, заходясь надрывным кашлем. Вязкие сгустки крови остаются на ее металлической ладони.{/n} "Гроксово семя! Это... кха-а... долгая и грязная история. А я не хочу портить момент".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae nonchalantly waves her off and immediately doubles over, coughing violently, leaving viscous clots of blood on her metal hand.{/n} "Grox seed! It's... it's—" She is interrupted by her hacking cough. "—a long and grubby story, and I don't want to ruin the moment."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae nonchalantly waves her off and immediately doubles over, coughing violently, leaving viscous clots of blood on her metal hand.{/n} "Groxseed! It's... it's—" {n}She is interrupted by her hacking cough.{/n} "—a long and grubby story, and I don't want to ruin the moment."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは冷たく払いのけ、すぐさま前かがみになって激しく咳き込む。その金属の手には粘ついた血のかたまりがついている。{/n}「蜥蜴牛の種だね！はな…話すのも―」{n}ゴホゴホと咳がジェイの発言を遮る。{/n}「―汚らわしい長話だよ、アタシは今を無駄にしたくないんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nonchalantly waves her off and immediately doubles over, coughing violently, leaving viscous clots of blood on her metal hand.{/n} "Groxseed! It's... it's—" {n}She is interrupted by her hacking cough.{/n} "—a long and grubby story, and I don't want to ruin the moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは冷たく払いのけ、すぐさま前かがみになって激しく咳き込む。その金属の手には粘ついた血のかたまりがついている。{/n}「蜥蜴牛の種だね！はな…話すのも―」{n}ゴホゴホと咳がジェイの発言を遮る。{/n}「―汚らわしい長話だよ、アタシは今を無駄にしたくないんだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊若无其事地挥挥手让她离开，随即弯下腰，剧烈地咳嗽起来。她的金属手掌上沾满了粘稠的血块。{/n}“格洛克斯兽的孽种！这，这件事——”{n}又一阵咳嗽打断了她的话。{/n}“——说起来又臭又长，我可不想在这时候扫兴。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nonchalantly waves her off and immediately doubles over, coughing violently, leaving viscous clots of blood on her metal hand.{/n} "Groxseed! It's... it's—" {n}She is interrupted by her hacking cough.{/n} "—a long and grubby story, and I don't want to ruin the moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊若无其事地挥挥手让她离开，随即弯下腰，剧烈地咳嗽起来。她的金属手掌上沾满了粘稠的血块。{/n}“格洛克斯兽的孽种！这，这件事——”又一阵咳嗽打断了她的话。“——说起来又臭又长，我可不想在这时候扫兴。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae agite la main d'un geste nonchalant avant qu'une violente quinte de toux lui fasse cracher des caillots d'un sang visqueux sur sa main métallique.{/n} « Par tous les grox ! C'est... c'est... {n}essaie-t-elle de dire avant d'être interrompue par sa toux.{/n} C'est une longue et sale histoire. Je ne veux pas gâcher ce moment. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nonchalantly waves her off and immediately doubles over, coughing violently, leaving viscous clots of blood on her metal hand.{/n} "Groxseed! It's... it's—" {n}She is interrupted by her hacking cough.{/n} "—a long and grubby story, and I don't want to ruin the moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae agite la main d'un geste nonchalant avant qu'une violente quinte de toux lui fasse cracher des caillots d'un sang visqueux sur sa main métallique.{/n} « Par tous les grox ! C'est... c'est... {n}essaie-t-elle de dire avant d'être interrompue par sa toux.{/n} C'est une longue et sale histoire. Je ne veux pas gâcher ce moment. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae la aparta despreocupada e inmediatamente se retuerce para toser bruscamente, dejando viscosos coágulos de sangre en su mano metálica.{/n} «¡Me cago en un grox!». {n}La interrumpe su tos seca.{/n} «Es... es... una larga y sucia historia; no quiero arruinar el momento».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nonchalantly waves her off and immediately doubles over, coughing violently, leaving viscous clots of blood on her metal hand.{/n} "Groxseed! It's... it's—" {n}She is interrupted by her hacking cough.{/n} "—a long and grubby story, and I don't want to ruin the moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae la aparta despreocupada e inmediatamente se retuerce para toser bruscamente, dejando viscosos coágulos de sangre en su mano metálica.{/n} «¡Me cago en un grox!». La interrumpe su tos seca. «Es... es... una larga y sucia historia; no quiero arruinar el momento».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae winkt nonchalant ab und krümmt sich mit einem Mal, als sie von einem Hustenanfall geschüttelt wird, der rote Klumpen auf ihrer metallenen Hand hinterlässt.{/n} "Groxsaat! Das ... das ..." {n}Sie wird von einer weiteren Hustenattacke unterbrochen.{/n} "Ist eine lange und schmutzige Geschichte, und ich möchte den Augenblick nicht zerstören."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nonchalantly waves her off and immediately doubles over, coughing violently, leaving viscous clots of blood on her metal hand.{/n} "Groxseed! It's... it's—" {n}She is interrupted by her hacking cough.{/n} "—a long and grubby story, and I don't want to ruin the moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae winkt nonchalant ab und krümmt sich mit einem Mal, als sie von einem Hustenanfall geschüttelt wird, der rote Klumpen auf ihrer metallenen Hand hinterlässt.{/n} "Groxsaat! Das ... das ..." Sie wird von einer weiteren Hustenattacke unterbrochen. "Ist eine lange und schmutzige Geschichte, und ich möchte den Augenblick nicht zerstören."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, umursamazca Argenta'yı başından savıp hemen iki büklüm oluyor. Şiddetle öksürüp metal eline yapış yapış kan pıhtıları bulaştırıyor.{/n} "Groks dölü! Bu... Bu..." {n}Kuru bir öksürükle sözü kesiliyor.{/n} "Uzun ve rezil bir hikâye. Bu anı mahvetmeyeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae nonchalantly waves her off and immediately doubles over, coughing violently, leaving viscous clots of blood on her metal hand.{/n} "Groxseed! It's... it's—" {n}She is interrupted by her hacking cough.{/n} "—a long and grubby story, and I don't want to ruin the moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, umursamazca Argenta'yı başından savıp hemen iki büklüm oluyor. Şiddetle öksürüp metal eline yapış yapış kan pıhtıları bulaştırıyor.{/n} "Groks dölü! Bu... Bu..." {n}Kuru bir öksürükle sözü kesiliyor.{/n} "... Uzun ve rezil bir hikâye. Bu anı mahvetmeyeyim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
